name: Cookies II: Crystallized
description:
A mix of tower defense, strategy and resource management.  This game is a DLC for the game Cookies II released last year. Also not canon to the original story of the Cookies Universe. Made using SFML and C++.

How to play:

There are many keys that do many different things but the most important ones are:

  • mouse to move around the world
  • W, A, S, D, or arrow keys as an alternative to a mouse for moving around
  • space for seeing additional information like time spent on the level
  • hold shift when you need to add a building into the queue
  • left click - select, right click deselect
Music:

All in-game music is by Cursedsnake.

That includes: Awake, Get smooshed, Beyond, Lunar, and Get there.

How to run the game:

Once downloaded, unzip the folder and run Cookies II.exe
